attributes.action: Stop boots from charging to deliver prescription medicine
attributes.background:
Boots have started charging £5 per delivery per person  for prescription medicine. (Or £55 per person per year).
This can't be right when many of these people are elderly, frail, disabled and vulnerable. 
Stop Boots from making money of the most vulnerable in our society.

rejection.details: This is a decision for Boots and not the UK Government or Parliament.
